that any information you provide is encrypted and transmitted securely.</p>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t        </div>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t                     Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) Emergency Use Authorizations for Medical Devices\n                    </a>\n\n                        <div class=\"views-element-container form-group\"><div class=\"view view-in-this-section view-id-in_this_section view-display-id-block_5 js-view-dom-id-4caa8f4eb06bbf5a2f24076ac0fb0f9566614e0c642bb733368f9bffab6dec97\">\n  \n    \n EUAs</a></li>\n          <li><a href=\"/medical-devices/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19-emergency-use-authorizations-medical-devices/vitro-diagnostics-euas\" class=\"lcds-section-nav__link\">In Vitro Diagnostics EUAs</a></li>\n          <li><a href=\"/medical-devices/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19-emergency-use-authorizations-medical-devices/infusion-pump-euas\" class=\"lcds-section-nav__link\">Infusion Pump EUAs</a></li>\n Protective Equipment EUAs</a></li>\n          <li><a href=\"/medical-devices/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19-emergency-use-authorizations-medical-devices/remote-or-wearable-patient-monitoring-devices-euas\" class=\"lcds-section-nav__link\">Remote or Wearable Patient Monitoring Devices EUAs</a></li>\n          <li><a href=\"/medical-devices/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19-emergency-use-authorizations-medical-devices/respiratory-assist-devices-euas\" class=\"lcds-section-nav__link\">Respiratory Assist Devices EUAs</a></li>\n          <li><a href=\"/medical-devices/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19-emergency-use-authorizations-medical-devices/ventilators-and-ventilator-accessories-euas\" href=\"/medical-devices/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19-emergency-use-authorizations-medical-devices/other-medical-device-euas\" class=\"lcds-section-nav__link\">Other Medical Device EUAs</a></li>\n </li>\n\n    </ul>\n\n</nav>\n\n  </section>\n\n<section id=\"block-entityviewcontent-15\" data-block-plugin-id=\"entity_view:node\" class=\"block block-ctools block-entity-viewnode clearfix\">\n  \n    \n\n      \n    <ol class=\"lcds-breadcrumb visible-md visible-lg\">\n          <li >\n                  <a href=\"/\">Home</a>\n              </li>\n          <li >\n                  <a     <li >\n                  <a href=\"/medical-devices/emergency-situations-medical-devices/emergency-use-authorizations-medical-devices\">Emergency Use Authorizations for Medical Devices</a>\n              </li>\n          <li >\n                  <a href=\"/medical-devices/emergency-use-authorizations-medical-devices/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19-emergency-use-authorizations-medical-devices\">Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) Emergency Use Authorizations for Medical Devices</a>\n              </li>\n          <li >\n                  <a class=\"current-link\">Personal Protective Equipment EUAs</a>\n              </li>\n      </ol>\n\n\n\n\n<ol class=\"lcds-breadcrumb visible-sm visible-xs\">\n  <li>\n    <a href=\"/medical-devices/emergency-use-authorizations-medical-devices/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19-emergency-use-authorizations-medical-devices\" title=\"Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) Emergency Use Authorizations for Medical Devices\">\n     Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) Emergency Use Authorizations for Medical Devices\n    </a>\n  </li>\n</ol>\n\n  </section>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n                                \n      <main>\n\n                                 <article id=\"main-content\" class=\"article main-content container-fluid\" role=\"article\">\n          \n                                                                <header class=\"row content-header\" role=\"heading\">\n                         <section id=\"block-entityviewcontent-2\" data-block-plugin-id=\"entity_view:node\" class=\"block block-ctools block-entity-viewnode clearfix\">\n  \n    \n\n      \n<div class=\"col-sm-12 col-md-8 col-md-offset-2\">\n\n  <h1 class=\"content-title text-center\">Personal Protective Equipment EUAs</h1>\n  \n  \t\n    <div class=\"lcds-toolbar lcds-toolbar--social\">\n      <ul class=\"lcds-share lcds-share--default\">\n    <li class=\"lcds-share__item\">\n      <a href=\"https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=\" class=\"lcds-share__btn lcds-share--default__btn-facebook js-share\" id=\"fb-share\" target=\"_blank\"><span class=\"fa icon-facebook\" aria-hidden=\"true\"></span>Share</a>\n    </li>\n    <li class=\"lcds-share__item\">\n      <a href=\"https://twitter.com/intent/tweet/?text=Personal%20Protective%20Equipment%20EUAs&amp;url=https://www.fda.gov%2Fmedical-devices%2Fcoronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19-emergency-use-authorizations-medical-devices%2Fpersonal-protective-equipment-euas\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"lcds-share__btn lcds-share--default__btn-twitter js-share\" id=\"twitter-share\"><span class=\"fa icon-twitter\" aria-hidden=\"true\"></span>Tweet</a>\n    </li>\n    <li class=\"lcds-share__item hidden-xs\">\n      <a href=\"https://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?mini=true&amp;url=https://www.fda.gov%2Fmedical-devices%2Fcoronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19-emergency-use-authorizations-medical-devices%2Fpersonal-protective-equipment-euas&amp;title=Personal%20Protective%20Equipment%20EUAs&amp;source=FDA\" class=\"lcds-share__btn lcds-share--default__btn-linkedin js-share\" id=\"linkedin-share\" target=\"_blank\"><span class=\"fa icon-linkedin\" aria-hidden=\"true\"></span>Linkedin</a>\n    </li>\n\n    <li class=\"lcds-share__item\">\n      <a href=\"mailto:?subject=Personal%20Protective%20Equipment%20EUAs&amp;body=https://www.fda.gov%2Fmedical-devices%2Fcoronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19-emergency-use-authorizations-medical-devices%2Fpersonal-protective-equipment-euas\" class=\"lcds-share__btn lcds-share--default__btn-mail\"><span class=\"fa icon-envelope\" aria-hidden=\"true\"></span>Email</a>\n      </li>\n    <li class=\" lcds-share__item hidden-xs\">\n      <a href=\"javascript:window.print();\" title=\"Print this page\" class=\"lcds-share__btn lcds-share--default__btn-print\"><span class=\"fa icon-print\" aria-hidden=\"true\"></span>Print</a>\n    </li>\n  </ul>\n  <div class=\"form-group\">\n    \n  </div>\n</div>\n \n</div>\n\n  </section>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n                      </header>\n                              \n                                                                           <div class=\"col-md-8 col-md-push-2\" role=\"main\">\n\n                            \n                            \n                            \n                            \n                                              \n  \n<p><a data-entity-substitution=\"canonical\" data-entity-type=\"node\" data-entity-uuid=\"09b16844-8ede-4d45-b072-97d725223b40\" href=\"/medical-devices/general-hospital-devices-and-supplies/personal-protective-equipment-infection-control\" title=\"Personal Protective Equipment for Infection Control\">Personal Protective Equipment</a> refers to protective clothing, helmets, gloves, face shields, goggles, respirators or other equipment designed to protect the wearer from injury or the spread of infection or illness.</p>\n\n<p>To help address concerns about availability during the COVID-19 pandemic, the FDA has issued EUAs for certain PPE products including face shields, other barriers, and respiratory protective devices such as respirators. Additionally, the FDA has issued recommendations and policies about PPE which can be found here: <a data-entity-substitution=\"canonical\" data-entity-type=\"node\" data-entity-uuid=\"75fa614e-6afd-4f77-9ab1-3956ec55aeb5\" href=\"/medical-devices/guidance-documents-medical-devices-and-radiation-emitting-products/recent-final-medical-device-guidance-documents\" title=\"Recent Final Medical Device Guidance Documents\">Recent Final Medical Device Guidance Documents</a>.</p>\n\n<p>Templates for these EUA submissions are available to help facilitate the preparation, submission, and authorization of an EUA, including an <a data-entity-substitution=\"media_download\" data-entity-type=\"media\" data-entity-uuid=\"7c9fa7f5-461b-4a2c-95d3-fc5b333d3cce\" href=\"/media/137965/download\" title=\"Pre-Emergency Use Authorization (EUA)/EUA Interactive Review Template For Non-IVD Products\">Interactive Review Template For Non-IVD Products</a>. Additionally, the FDA has posted a <a data-entity-substitution=\"media_download\" data-entity-type=\"media\" data-entity-uuid=\"820b949c-3adf-4df8-aac4-4308fb9313d5\" href=\"/media/140896/download\" title=\"Surgical Masks EUA Template for Addition to Appendix A\">Surgical Masks EUA Template for Addition to Appendix A</a>\u00a0of the Surgical Mask Umbrella EUA.</p>\n\n<h2>Table of Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) EUAs</h2>\n\n<ul><li><a href=\"#surgicalmasks\">Umbrella EUA for Surgical Masks</a></li>\n\t<li><a href=\"#respirators\">N95 and Other Respirators EUAs</a></li>\n\t<li><a href=\"#nonniosh\">Umbrella EUA for Non-NIOSH-Approved Disposable Filtering Facepiece Respirators (FFRs)</a></li>\n\t<li><a href=\"#imported\">Umbrella EUA for Imported, Non-NIOSH-Approved Disposable Filtering Facepiece Respirators (FFRs)</a></li>\n\t<li><a href=\"#barrier\">Face Shields and Other Barrier EUAs</a></li>\n</ul><h3><a id=\"surgicalmasks\" name=\"surgicalmasks\"></a>Umbrella EUA for Surgical Masks</h3>\n\n<p>On August 5, 2020, the FDA issued an umbrella emergency use authorization (EUA) for certain disposable, single-use surgical masks in response to concerns relating to insufficient supply and availability of such masks. This EUA authorizes the emergency use of surgical masks that meet certain performance requirements for use in healthcare settings by health care personnel as personal protective equipment to provide a physical barrier to fluids and particulate materials to prevent HCP exposure to respiratory droplets and large particles during surgical mask shortages resulting from the COVID-19 pandemic. Surgical masks that have been confirmed by FDA to meet the criteria under the EUA are included below in Appendix A as authorized surgical masks.</p>\n\n<ul><li><a data-entity-substitution=\"media_download\" data-entity-type=\"media\" data-entity-uuid=\"8858cc42-ee06-4e55-bd6b-912408991890\" href=\"/media/140894/download\" title=\"EUA Letter of Authorization - Umbrella EUA for Surgical Masks\">EUA Letter of Authorization - Umbrella EUA for Surgical Masks\u00a0</a></li>\n\t<li><a data-entity-substitution=\"media_download\" data-entity-type=\"media\" data-entity-uuid=\"b22fa8b5-ffcb-41ff-9b8a-fc26b3789aa0\" href=\"/media/140895/download\" title=\"Umbrella EUA for Surgical Masks - Fact Sheet for Healthcare Personnel\">Fact Sheet for Healthcare Personnel</a></li>\n\t<li><a href=\"#appendixasurgicalmasks\">Appendix A: Authorized Surgical Masks</a>\u00a0</li>\n</ul><p>The <a data-entity-substitution=\"media_download\" data-entity-type=\"media\" data-entity-uuid=\"820b949c-3adf-4df8-aac4-4308fb9313d5\" href=\"/media/140896/download\" title=\"Surgical Masks EUA Template for Addition to Appendix A\">Surgical Masks EUA Template for Addition to Appendix A</a>\u00a0can be used to provide the information requested in the EUA to the FDA.</p>\n\n<h4><a id=\"appendixasurgicalmasks\" name=\"appendixasurgicalmasks\"></a>Appendix A: Authorized Surgical Masks</h4>\n\n<p>The table below includes a list of surgical masks authorized by this Umbrella EUA for emergency use during the COVID-19 public health emergency.</p>\n\n<div class=\"lcds-datatable lcds-datatable--ckeditor\">\n<table aria-readonly=\"true\" class=\"table\" data-column-defs=\"[{ &quot;targets&quot;: 0, &quot;type&quot;: &quot;date&quot; }]\" data-order=\"[ 0, &quot;desc&quot; ]\" data-page-length=\"100\" data-paging=\"true\" data-searching=\"true\" role=\"grid\"><thead><tr role=\"row\"><th scope=\"col\">Date of Addition</th>\n\t\t\t<th scope=\"col\">Manufacturer</th>\n\t\t\t<th scope=\"col\">Authorized Product Name (including model numbers)</th>\n\t\t</tr></thead><tbody><tr role=\"row\"><td>08/08/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Outdoor Research</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Outdoor Research Surgical Mask model #OR2159</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr><td>08/18/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Venus Group, Inc.</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Venus Medical Grade Disposable Surgical Mask</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr><td>09/19/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Premier Guard USA LLC</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Premier Guard USA Surgical Face Mask 20-1002-SFM3</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr><td>10/05/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Hanesbrands, Inc.</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Hanes Surgical Mask 01, Small and Large</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr><td>10/08/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>WPT Corporation</td>\n\t\t\t<td>WPT ASTM F2100-19 Level 3 Earloop Surgical Face Mask (Model # SMS2020)</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr><td>10/15/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Premium-PPE Amerishield</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Premium PPE Amerishield Disposable Surgical Mask Model #: PPE-M-AS-SUR-lvl2-S</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr><td>10/15/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Brandix Apparel Solutions Limited</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Disposable Surgical Mask BRNDX-DSM-001-LARGE</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr><td>10/28/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>SIO International Wisconsin, Inc.</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Sharp MQ-3050 Surgical Mask<br />\n\t\t\tFoxconn MQ-3050 Surgical Mask\u00a0</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr><td>11/03/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Fischer Manufacturing, LLC</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Heartland Health Surgical Mask</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr><td>11/06/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>EcoGuard Inc.</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>Surgical Mask - Disposable Single-Use 3-Ply Earloop<br />\n\t\t\tModel #: EcoGuard B ECO01</p>\n\n\t\t\t<p>Surgical Mask - Disposable Single-Use 3-Ply Tie-on<br />\n\t\t\tModel #: EcoGuard B ECO02</p>\n\n\t\t\t<p>Surgical Mask - Disposable Single-Use 4-Ply Earloop<br />\n\t\t\tModel #: EcoGuard A ECO03</p>\n\n\t\t\t<p>Surgical Mask - Disposable Single-Use 4-Ply Tie-on<br />\n\t\t\tModel #: EcoGuard A ECO04</p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr><td>11/20/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Rymco Medical</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>Surgical Mask (Tie-On)<br />\n\t\t\tModel #: IMABEU</p>\n\n\t\t\t<p>Surgical Mask (Earloop)<br />\n\t\t\tModel #: IMSBEU</p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t</tr></tbody></table></div>\n\n<h3><a name=\"respirators\" id=\"respirators\"></a>N95 and Other Respirators EUAs (including EUAs for NIOSH-Approved N95s and imported respirators)</h3>\n\n<p>The table below includes information about respirators authorized for emergency use by healthcare personal during the COVID-19 public health emergency.</p>\n\n<div class=\"lcds-datatable lcds-datatable--ckeditor\">\n<table aria-readonly=\"true\" class=\"table\" data-column-defs=\"[{ &quot;targets&quot;: 0, &quot;type&quot;: &quot;date&quot; }]\" data-order=\"[ 0, &quot;desc&quot; ]\" data-page-length=\"100\" data-paging=\"true\" data-searching=\"true\" role=\"grid\"><thead><tr role=\"row\"><th scope=\"col\">Date EUA Issued</th>\n\t\t\t<th scope=\"col\">PPE (Letter of Authorization)</th>\n\t\t\t<th scope=\"col\">Other Documents</th>\n\t\t</tr></thead><tbody><tr role=\"row\"><td>03/28/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td><a data-entity-substitution=\"media_download\" data-entity-type=\"media\" data-entity-uuid=\"45edd60f-5765-4ad5-94c7-37ac9bb0ccbd\" href=\"/media/135763/download\" title=\"NIOSH-Approved Filtering Facepiece Respirators for Use in Health Care Settings - Letter of Authorization\">NIOSH-Approved Air Purifying Respirators for Use in Health Care Settings During Response to the COVID-19 Public Health Emergency</a></td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<ul><li><a data-entity-substitution=\"media_download\" data-entity-type=\"media\" data-entity-uuid=\"4f055636-aab7-4db2-a928-667ff973a0dd\" href=\"/media/136023/download\" title=\"NIOSH-Approved Disposable Filtering Facepiece Respirators - EUA Clarification\">EUA Clarification Letter on Respirators</a></li>\n\t\t\t</ul></td>\n\t\t</tr></tbody></table></div>\n\n<hr /><h3><a name=\"nonniosh\" id=\"nonniosh\"></a>Umbrella EUA for Non-NIOSH-Approved Disposable Filtering Facepiece Respirators (FFRs) Manufactured in China (Reissued October 15, 2020)</h3>\n\n<p>On April 3, 2020, the FDA issued an umbrella EUA for certain filtering face-piece respirators (FFRs) that are manufactured in China and are not approved by the National Institutes of Occupational Safety and Health (NIOSH). As mentioned in <a href=\"https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/hcp/respirators-strategy/crisis-alternate-strategies.html\">CDC's strategies for optimizing respirator supply</a>, other countries approve respirators according to country-specific standards. These devices are evaluated using methods similar to those used by NIOSH and are still expected to provide adequate protection for healthcare personnel. Non-NIOSH-approved FFRs manufactured in China\u00a0that have been confirmed by FDA to meet the criteria under the EUA are included below in Appendix A.</p>\n\n<p>As part of the government's continuous quality assessment of these respirators, the FDA, working with CDC NIOSH, conducted additional assessments and found that some of the respirators authorized under the April 3, 2020 EUA did not meet the expected performance standards. In response, the FDA revised and reissued the EUA on May 7, 2020 to among other revisions, revise the third criterion for eligibility. Additionally, the FDA, in collaboration with CDC NIOSH, is increasing surveillance and sampling of all respirators imported from China - all respirator shipments from China that come into the U.S. will be subject to random sampling and testing by CDC NIOSH to determine whether the respirator meets the expected particulate filtration standards.</p>\n\n<p>On June 6, 2020 the FDA further revised the Scope of Authorization of this EUA, to among other changes, further revise the third eligibility criterion, revise the second eligibility criterion, and remove decontaminated respirators from the scope of authorized products such that authorized respirators listed in Appendix A will no longer be authorized if they are decontaminated.</p>\n\n<p>On October 15, 2020, the FDA reissued the Emergency Use Authorization (EUA) for Non-NIOSH-Approved Disposable Filtering Facepiece Respirators Manufactured in China to authorize for emergency use only those respirators listed in the EUA\u2019s Appendix A as of the date of this reissuance. Effective immediately, this EUA no longer includes the three eligibility criteria that were included in the previous June 6, 2020 authorization letter, meaning the FDA will no longer be reviewing requests and adding new respirator models to Appendix A based on those criteria. Further explanation of the revisions can be found in the <a data-entity-substitution=\"canonical\" data-entity-type=\"node\" data-entity-uuid=\"f96012ca-5340-4972-8c67-7dad0958edad\" href=\"/medical-devices/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19-emergency-use-authorizations-medical-devices/faqs-euas-non-niosh-approved-respirators-during-covid-19-pandemic\" title=\"FAQs on the EUAs for Non-NIOSH Approved Respirators During the COVID-19 Pandemic  \">Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) about Non-NIOSH-Approved Filtering Facepiece Respirators</a>.</p>\n\n<ul><li>EUA Letter of Authorization - <a data-entity-substitution=\"media_download\" data-entity-type=\"media\" data-entity-uuid=\"bd39128a-8ba6-4226-b0e7-ff65d4780b15\" href=\"/media/136664/download\" title=\"FFRS Manufactured in China Letter\">Umbrella EUA: Non-NIOSH-Approved Disposable Filtering Facepiece Respirators Manufactured in China</a> (Reissued October 15, 2020)</li>\n\t<li><a data-entity-substitution=\"canonical\" data-entity-type=\"node\" data-entity-uuid=\"f96012ca-5340-4972-8c67-7dad0958edad\" href=\"/medical-devices/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19-emergency-use-authorizations-medical-devices/faqs-euas-non-niosh-approved-respirators-during-covid-19-pandemic\" title=\"FAQs on the EUAs for Non-NIOSH Approved Respirators During the COVID-19 Pandemic  \">Non-NIOSH Approved Disposable Filtering Facepiece Respirators Manufactured in China EUA FAQs</a></li>\n\t<li><a href=\"#appendixa\">Appendix A: Authorized Respirators, Non-NIOSH Respirators Manufactured in China</a> (Updated\u00a0October 15, 2020)</li>\n\t<li><a href=\"#nolongerauth\">Respirator Models No Longer Authorized</a> (Updated\u00a0October\u00a015, 2020)</li>\n</ul><h4><a id=\"appendixa\" name=\"appendixa\"></a>Appendix A: Authorized Imported, Non-NIOSH Approved Respirators Manufactured in China (Updated:\u00a0October 15, 2020)</h4>\n\n<p>The table below includes a list of non-NIOSH respirators authorized by <a data-entity-substitution=\"media_download\" data-entity-type=\"media\" data-entity-uuid=\"bd39128a-8ba6-4226-b0e7-ff65d4780b15\" href=\"/media/136664/download\" title=\"FFRS Manufactured in China Letter\">this Umbrella EUA</a> for emergency use during the COVID-19 public health emergency.</p>\n\n<p>As stated in the EUA, authorized respirators should be used in accordance with CDC's recommendations. For the most current CDC recommendations on optimizing respirator use, please visit CDC's webpage: <a href=\"https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/hcp/respirators-strategy/index.html\">Strategies for Optimizing the Supply of N95 Respirators</a>.</p>\n\n<div class=\"lcds-datatable lcds-datatable--ckeditor\">\n<table aria-readonly=\"true\" class=\"table\" data-order=\"[ 0, &quot;asc&quot; ]\" data-page-length=\"100\" data-paging=\"true\" data-searching=\"true\" role=\"grid\"><thead><tr role=\"row\"><th scope=\"row\">Manufacturer</th>\n\t\t\t<th scope=\"row\">Respirator Model(s)</th>\n\t\t\t<th scope=\"row\">Instructions for Use</th>\n\t\t</tr></thead><tbody><tr role=\"row\"><td>3M</td>\n\t\t\t<td>9001, 9002, 9501, 9501+, 9501V+, 9502, 9502+, 9502V+, 9505+, 9541, 9541V, 9542, 9542V, 9552, 9552V</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<ul><li>9001: <a href=\"https://multimedia.3m.com/mws/media/1827635O/3m-particulate-respirator-9001-ui-eua.pdf\">IFU</a></li>\n\t\t\t\t<li>9002: <a href=\"https://multimedia.3m.com/mws/media/1827636O/3m-particulate-respirator-9002-ui-eua.pdf\">IFU</a></li>\n\t\t\t\t<li>9501: <a Note: As outlined in the EUA, a respirator model with a removal date of May 7, 2020 is eligible for authorization under the revised third criterion if it has had particulate filtration efficiency assessed by NIOSH using a modified version of NIOSH's Standard Test Procedure (STP) TEB-APR-STP-0059 within 45 calendar days of May 7, 2020, and has results of NIOSH testing that indicate a minimum and maximum filtration efficiency greater than or equal to 95 percent. Respirators with removal dates after May 7, 2020 are not eligible for the revised third criterion. A respirator that meets the revised third criterion, or any of the other eligibility criteria in the EUA, is authorized and will be added to Appendix A as an authorized respirator once FDA confirms the eligibility criteria are met. Results from NIOSH's testing are provided at: <a href=\"https://www.cdc.gov/niosh/npptl/respirators/testing/NonNIOSHresults.html\">https://www.cdc.gov/niosh/npptl/respirators/testing/NonNIOSHresults.html</a></p>\n\n<div class=\"lcds-datatable lcds-datatable--ckeditor\">\n<table aria-readonly=\"true\" class=\"table\" data-column-defs=\"[{ &quot;targets&quot;: 0, &quot;type&quot;: &quot;date&quot; }]\" data-order=\"[ 0, &quot;desc&quot; ]\" data-page-length=\"100\" data-paging=\"true\" data-searching=\"true\" role=\"grid\"><thead><tr role=\"row\"><th scope=\"col\">Date No longer Authorized</th>\n\t\t\t<th scope=\"col\">Manufacturer</th>\n\t\t\t<th scope=\"col\">Respirator Model(s) No Longer Authorized</th>\n\t\t</tr></thead><tbody><tr role=\"row\"><td>05/07/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>AAB (China) Co., Ltd</td>\n\t\t\t<td>KN95</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr role=\"row\"><td>05/07/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Anshun Health and Medical Technology Co., LTD</td>\n\t\t\t<td>AKF2002</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr role=\"row\"><td>05/07/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Bei (Dong Shan) Protective Supplies Co., LTD</td>\n\t\t\t<td>B707</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr role=\"row\"><td>05/07/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Changsha JNEYL Medical Equipment Co., Ltd</td>\n\t\t\t<td>JN-9501</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr role=\"row\"><td>05/07/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Changzhou Wedream Medical Device Co., Ltd</td>\n\t\t\t<td>KN95</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr role=\"row\"><td>05/07/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Chongqing China Nano Technology Co., Ltd</td>\n\t\t\t<td>ZN8005</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr role=\"row\"><td>05/07/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Chongqing Zaisheng Technology Co., Ltd.</td>\n\t\t\t<td>ZS-A950</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr role=\"row\"><td>05/07/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Chuzhou Qiao Dong Industrial Co., Ltd</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Langie KN95 FFP2</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr role=\"row\"><td>05/07/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Creative Concepts Manufacturing Ltd</td>\n\t\t\t<td>02669, KN95</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr role=\"row\"><td>05/07/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>CTT CO. Ltd.</td>\n\t\t\t<td>WN-N95FG</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr role=\"row\"><td>05/07/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Yiwu Henghao household products Co., Ltd</td>\n\t\t\t<td>HH-KN95-001</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr role=\"row\"><td>05/07/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Yiwu Yifan Knitting Co. Ltd</td>\n\t\t\t<td>KN95</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr role=\"row\"><td>05/07/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Zhangzhou Easepal Industrial Corp.</td>\n\t\t\t<td>MASK-104</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr role=\"row\"><td>05/07/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Zhejiang Baiyi Intelligent Garment Co LTD</td>\n\t\t\t<td>KN95</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr role=\"row\"><td>05/07/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Zhejiang Shengtai Baby Products Co Ltd</td>\n\t\t\t<td>KN95</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr role=\"row\"><td>05/07/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Zhengzhou QBS New Material Co., LTD</td>\n\t\t\t<td>KN95</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr role=\"row\"><td>05/07/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Zhengzhou Wanshenshan Healthcare PPE Co., Ltd.</td>\n\t\t\t<td>KN95</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr role=\"row\"><td>06/06/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Fujian Kang Chen Daily Necessities Co, Ltd.</td>\n\t\t\t<td>K0450, 57793</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr><td>10/15/2020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>HeiQ Materials AG</td>\n\t\t\t<td>HVB-FFP2-01</td>\n\t\t</tr></tbody></table></div>\n\n<hr /><h3><a id=\"imported\" name=\"imported\"></a>Umbrella EUA for Imported, Non-NIOSH-Approved Disposable Filtering Facepiece Respirators (FFRs) (Reissued June 6, 2020)</h3>\n\n<p>On March 24, 2020, the FDA issued an umbrella EUA for certain imported disposable filtering facepiece respirators (FFRs) that are not approved by the National Institute for Occupational Safety and Health (NIOSH) and that meet criteria as described in the EUA. Under this EUA, authorized respirators, which are listed in Exhibit 1, are authorized for use in healthcare settings by healthcare personnel when used in accordance with CDC recommendations to prevent wearer exposure to pathogenic biological airborne particulates during FFR shortages resulting from the Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) outbreak.</p>\n\n<p>On March 28, 2020, to further address the shortage of disposable FFRs, the FDA determined it was necessary to reissue the March 24, 2020 letter in order to amend the Scope of Authorization to additionally authorize the use of authorized respirators that have been decontaminated pursuant to the terms and conditions of an authorized decontamination system.</p>\n\n<p>The FDA continues to be vigilant and take prompt action on imported, non-NIOSH approved respirators to ensure health care personnel receive adequate protection. On June 6, 2020, the FDA again revised this EUA to revise the scope\u00a0concerning the decontamination of respirators with exhalation valves, and also revised the Scope of Authorization with respect to which jurisdictions are included in the second criterion for eligibility, among other revisions.</p>\n\n<ul><li>EUA Letter of Authorization - <a data-entity-substitution=\"media_download\" data-entity-type=\"media\" data-entity-uuid=\"d6fd4e38-cc71-4790-9a39-1d719c12caab\" href=\"/media/136403/download\" title=\"Imported, Non-NIOSH-Approved Disposable Filtering Facepiece Respirators - Letter of Authorization\">Umbrella EUA Imported, Non-NIOSH-Approved Disposable Filtering Facepiece Respirators</a> (Reissued 06/06/2020)</li>\n\t<li><a href=\"#exhibit1\">Exhibit 1: Authorized Imported, Non-NIOSH-Approved Disposable Filtering Facepiece Respirators</a> (Updated\u00a0November 9, 2020)</li>\n</ul><h4><a id=\"#exhibit1\" name=\"#exhibit1\"></a>Exhibit 1: Authorized Imported, Non-NIOSH Disposable Filtering Facepiece Respirators (FFR) (Updated\u00a0November 9, 2020)</h4>\n\n<p>The table below includes a list of authorized non-NIOSH-approved disposable filtering facepiece respirators (FFRs) authorized under <a data-entity-substitution=\"media_download\" data-entity-type=\"media\" data-entity-uuid=\"d6fd4e38-cc71-4790-9a39-1d719c12caab\" href=\"/media/136403/download\" title=\"Imported, Non-NIOSH-Approved Disposable Filtering Facepiece Respirators - Letter of Authorization\">this Umbrella EUA</a> for emergency use in healthcare settings by healthcare personnel (HCP) when used in accordance with CDC recommendations. For the most current CDC recommendations on optimizing respirator use, please visit CDC's webpage: <a href=\"https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/hcp/respirators-strategy/index.html\">Strategies for Optimizing the Supply of N95 Respirators</a>.</p>\n\n<div class=\"lcds-datatable lcds-datatable--ckeditor\">\n<table aria-readonly=\"true\" class=\"table\" data-order=\"[ 0, &quot;asc&quot; ]\" data-page-length=\"100\" data-paging=\"true\" data-searching=\"true\" role=\"grid\"><thead><tr role=\"row\"><th scope=\"col\">Manufacturer</th>\n\t\t\t<th scope=\"col\">Respirator Model(s)</th>\n\t\t\t<th scope=\"col\">Country of Manufacture</th>\n\t\t\t<th scope=\"col\">Instructions for Use</th>\n\t\t</tr></thead><tbody><tr role=\"row\"><td>3M</td>\n\t\t\t<td>8205</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Japan</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\u00a0</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr role=\"row\"><td>3M</td>\n\t\t\t<td>8822</td>\n\t\t\t<td>South Korea</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\u00a0</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr role=\"row\"><td>3M</td>\n\t\t\t<td>9320+</td>\n\t\t\t<td>UK, Singapore, Turkey</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\u00a0</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr role=\"row\"><td>3M</td>\n\t\t\t<td>9322+</td>\n\t\t\t<td>UK, Singapore, Turkey</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\u00a0</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr role=\"row\"><td>Dromex</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Model 1020</td>\n\t\t\t<td>South Africa</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\u00a0</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr><td>Ap Mascarillas S.A. de C.V.</td>\n\t\t\t<td>AP M10, AP Z6</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Mexico</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\u00a0</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr><td>BTL Industries</td>\n\t\t\t<td>FLAT-FIT Healthcare Respirator</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Bulgaria</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<ul><li><a href=\"https://btl-misc.s3.eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/misc/BTL_Respirator_LF_User-Manual_ENESUS100_preview.pdf\">IFU</a></li>\n\t\t\t</ul></td>\n\t\t</tr><tr><td>Plastcor Do Brasil LTDA</td>\n\t\t\t<td>ECHO PFF2 CA 38.811</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Brazil</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<ul><li><a href=\"http://plastcors.com/instructionsforuse.pdf\">IFU</a></li>\n\t\t\t</ul></td>\n\t\t</tr><tr><td>Galia Textil S.A. DE C.V</td>\n\t\t\t<td>GTN95</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Mexico</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<ul><li><a href=\"https://galiatextil.org/en/producto/n95-respirator-2/\">IFU</a></li>\n\t\t\t</ul></td>\n\t\t</tr><tr><td>Novita, 9 Koi Marketing Pte Ltd</td>\n\t\t\t<td>R5</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Singapore</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<ul><li><a href=\"http://novita.com.sg/web/userguide/index.html\">IFU</a></li>\n\t\t\t</ul></td>\n\t\t</tr><tr><td>Grupo 10X SA DE CV d.b.a Sanitek Pro</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Sanitek Pro N95</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Mexico</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<ul><li><a href=\"https://sanitekpro.com/n95-respirator/\">IFU</a></li>\n\t\t\t</ul></td>\n\t\t</tr><tr><td>Rose Personal Protective Equipment Industry and Trade Anonym Company</td>\n\t\t\t<td>IRYS-08</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Turkey</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<ul><li><a href=\"http://ivrou.com/pdf/Intended%20Use%20and%20Other%20Instructions%20of%20IVROU-revised.pdf\">IFU</a></li>\n\t\t\t</ul></td>\n\t\t</tr><tr><td>Brands Unlimited S.A. de C.V.</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Medimask MM-001</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Mexico</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\u00a0</td>\n\t\t</tr><tr><td>Hygiene Austria LP GmbH</td>\n\t\t\t<td>HA PP02</td>\n\t\t\t<td>Austria</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\u00a0</td>\n\t\t</tr></tbody></table></div>\n\n<hr /><h3><a id=\"barrier\" name=\"barrier\"></a>Face Shields and Other Barrier EUAs</h3>\n\n<div class=\"callout\">\n<p>On May 1, 2020, the FDA issued an umbrella EUA for emergency use of protective barrier enclosures by healthcare providers (HCP) when caring for or performing medical procedures on patients who are known or suspected to have COVID-19 in healthcare settings to prevent HCP exposure to pathogenic biological airborne particulates by providing an extra layer of barrier protection in addition to personal protective equipment (PPE). The authorization of a device for emergency use under section 564 of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act (the Act) (21 U.S.C. 360bbb-3) may, pursuant to section 564(g)(2) of the Act, be revised or revoked when the criteria under section 564(b)(1) of the Act no longer exist, the criteria under section 564(c) of the Act for issuance of such authorization are no longer met, or other circumstances make such revision or revocation appropriate to protect the public health or safety.</p>\n\n<p>On August 20, 2020, based on FDA's continued review of the scientific evidence available, the FDA has become aware of information that supports a determination to revoke the umbrella EUA on the grounds that the criteria under section 564(c) of the Act for issuance of an EUA are no longer met (see section 564(g)(2)(B)). Under section 564(c) of the Act, an EUA may be issued only if FDA concludes \u201cthat, based on the totality of scientific evidence available to the Secretary, including data from adequate and well-controlled clinical trials, if available, it is reasonable to believe that: (A) the product may be effective in diagnosing, treating, or preventing ---(i) such disease or condition [\u2026]; and (B) the known and potential benefits of the product, when used to diagnose, prevent, or treat such disease or condition, outweigh the known and potential risks of the product [\u2026].\u201d In addition, FDA has determined that revocation is appropriate to protect the public health or safety (see section 564(g)(2)(C) of the Act), and that individualized consideration of each EUA request for protective barrier enclosures would better protect the public health.</p>\n</div>\n\n<p>Face shields and other barriers are a type of PPE intended to protect the user from bodily fluids, liquid splashes, or potentially infectious materials. Availability of certain PPE are an integral part of routine patient care during the COVID-19 pandemic. The table below includes authorization information about the use of authorized face shields and other barriers for use during the COVID-19 public health emergency.</p>\n\n<div>\n<div>\u00a0</div>\n</div>\n\n<div class=\"lcds-datatable lcds-datatable--ckeditor\">\n<table aria-readonly=\"true\" class=\"table\" data-column-defs=\"[{ &quot;targets&quot;: Resources:</h2>\n\n<ul><li><a data-entity-substitution=\"canonical\" data-entity-type=\"node\" data-entity-uuid=\"dd4faa86-8d00-4a45-98bd-769d1d85d6df\" href=\"/medical-devices/personal-protective-equipment-infection-control/n95-respirators-surgical-masks-and-face-masks\" title=\"N95 Respirators, Surgical Masks, and Face Masks\">N95 Respirators and Surgical Masks (Face Masks) </a></li>\n\t<li><a data-entity-substitution=\"canonical\" data-entity-type=\"node\" data-entity-uuid=\"eef3bae4-e1bc-46ce-b400-cfa272f75762\" href=\"/medical-devices/workshops-conferences-medical-devices/webinar-enforcement-policy-personal-protective-equipment-ppe-during-covid-19-immediately-effect\" title=\"Webinar - Enforcement Policy for Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) During COVID-19: Immediately in Effect Guidance - 04/06/2020 - 04/06/2020\">Enforcement Policy guidance webinar</a></li>\n\t<li><a data-entity-substitution=\"canonical\" data-entity-type=\"node\" data-entity-uuid=\"f96012ca-5340-4972-8c67-7dad0958edad\" href=\"/medical-devices/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19-emergency-use-authorizations-medical-devices/faqs-euas-non-niosh-approved-respirators-during-covid-19-pandemic\" title=\"FAQs on the EUAs for Non-NIOSH Approved Respirators During the COVID-19 Pandemic  \">FAQs on the EUAs for Non-NIOSH Approved Respirators During the COVID-19 Pandemic</a></li>\n\t<li><a data-entity-substitution=\"canonical\" data-entity-type=\"node\" data-entity-uuid=\"f862b4b9-97e4-46db-ac8b-80ea50f750f6\" href=\"/medical-devices/coronavirus-covid-19-and-medical-devices/face-masks-including-surgical-masks-and-respirators-covid-19\" title=\"Face Masks, Including Surgical Masks, and Respirators for COVID-19\">Face Masks and Surgical Masks for COVID-19: Manufacturing, Purchasing, Importing, and Donating Masks During the Public Health Emergency</a></li>\n</ul></div>\n</div>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n              \n                                            \n              \n            </div>\n\n                                                                                  <aside class=\"col-md-2 col-md-push-2\" role=\"complementary\">\n                  <section id=\"block-entityviewcontent-4\" data-block-plugin-id=\"entity_view:node\" class=\"block block-ctools block-entity-viewnode clearfix\">\n  \n    \n\n      \n\n<div role=\"article\" about=\"/medical-devices/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19-emergency-use-authorizations-medical-devices/personal-protective-equipment-euas\" class=\"region region-\">\n  <aside class=\"lcds-card lcds-card--border-top\" role=\"menu\">\n    <ul class=\"lcds-description-list\">\n      \n                            \n<div class=\"node-current-date\">\n  <li class=\"lcds-description-list__item\">\n    <div>\n      <h2 class=\"lcds-description-list__item-heading\">Content current as of:</h2>\n      <p class=\"lcds-description-list__item-text\"><time datetime=\"2020-11-23T00:00:00Z\">11/23/2020</time>\n</p>\n    </div>\n  </li>\n</div>\n\n\n  \n\n  \n\n  \n\n  \n\n  \n\n  \n\n  \n\n  \n\n  \n\n  \n\n  \n\n  \n\n  \n\n  \n\n  \n\n  \n\n  \n\n  \n\n  \n\n  \n\n  \n\n  \n              \n              \n<li class=\"lcds-description-list__item\">  \n\t<div>\n\t\t\n\t\t <h2 class=\"lcds-description-list__item-heading\">Regulated Product(s)</h2>\n\t\t <ul class=\"lcds-metadata-list\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t  <li>Medical Devices</li>\n\t\t\t  \t\t\t     \t\t\t  \t\t\t\t\t\t              \n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t</ul>\n\t \n\t\t\t     \n\t\t\t\t\t\t       \n\n\t\t\t  \n\t\t\t\t\t\t  \n\n\t\t\t  \n\t\t\t\t\t\t \n\t</div>\n</li>   \n\n    </ul>\n\n  </aside>\n</div>\n\n\n  </section>\n\n\n                </aside>\n            \n\n                                                                                <aside class=\"col-md-2 col-md-pull-10\" role=\"complementary\">\n                  <section id=\"block-entityviewcontent-3\" data-block-plugin-id=\"entity_view:node\" class=\"block block-ctools          <a href=\"/medical-devices/emergency-use-authorizations-medical-devices/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19-emergency-use-authorizations-medical-devices\" class=\"lcds-section-nav__link Authorizations for Medical Devices\n                      </a>\n\n          \n                        <div class=\"views-element-container form-group\"><div class=\"view view-in-this-section a=this.get(f);if(a)a=a.split(\":\");else if(100!=e)\"v\"==h&&(e=Math.random()>=e/100?0:100),a=[h,e,0],this.set(f,a.join(\":\"));else return!0;var c=a[1];if(100==c)return!0;switch(a[0]){case \"v\":return!1;case \"r\":return c=a[2]%Math.floor(100/c),a[2]++,this.set(f,a.join(\":\")),!c}return!0};\n  this.go=function(){if(this.check()){var a=document.createElement(\"script\");a.type=\"text/javascript\";a.src=g+ \"&t=\" + (new Date()).getTime();document.body&&document.body.appendChild(a)}};\n  this.start=function(){var a=this;window.addEventListener?window.addEventListener(\"load\",function(){a.go()},!1):window.attachEvent&&window.attachEvent(\"onload\",function(){a.go()})}};\n  try{(new
